storyInfo:
Zumama tells Gavial why it is so important that she defeat her.
But before she can finish, the Big Ugly, overpowered by its engine, goes out of control. The group moves to stop it.

attributes.content: The buildings here are so different from the other tribes...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Crappy houses!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Hm, the architecture and decor is all pretty crude.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Got a lotta weird, broken gizmos all over the place too.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Zumama, you've got a very unique tribe here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Looks like they enjoy fiddling around with machines just as much as you do.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: This is my people's masterpiece.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Yes. They now know the charm of the machines, and they have built the tribe you see here on their passion alone.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Look, it's Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: The Great Chief wasn't lying. She's planning to duel Gavial again with the Big Ugly.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: What?! No way I can miss that!
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: Wow, there's so many people!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Many of them are from other tribes who've came here after the ceremony. They will be joining us.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: So, what did you want to say?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, if you just left without a fuss, I wouldn't have cared. But since you're standing before me once again, I will defeat you right here and now.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Because you're too strong, Gavial.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Do you still remember that day?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: That day?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Before that day, I was just like you. I believed the strength in my fists was everything.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ahhhh!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Gavial wins!
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: Haha, I win again.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hmph, another rematch! I'll definitely win this time!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Sure!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Eh, why is the ground shaking?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Look over there!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wh- what's that?!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It's a big hunk of metal!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That is a Sargon nomadic city...
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: What's a Sargon?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Sargon is our country.
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: Then what's a nomadic city?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: A nomadic city is a very large tribe, with many people living in it.
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: I visited once, when I was young.
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. It won't come over here.
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: It will never have anything to do with us.
attributes.name: Old Archosauria

attributes.content: Zumama, what is it? Are you feeling sick?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No. I'm going home.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, I remember. A Sargon nomadic city was passing pretty close to us that day. You turned all weird after that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I think you're the weird one, Gavial.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: How could you not feel astonished after seeing something like that? How could you not be shocked? How could you not feel like a tiny speck of dust?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I mean, I guess I felt something like 'Wow, that's big.' But what's a big thing got to do with me?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That's our Gavial.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: But that's the day I lost interest in fighting with you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I asked Inam to help me find books on machinery, and began studying Sargonian and mechanical engineering.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Then I met the High Priest, and we began building the Big, Ugly Thing together.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I know. I did go to look for you after all.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm? Does that mean that the weirdo over there is your invisible friend?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That's right!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Woah! When did you get here?!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: This feller's got the same energy as my Baws, the Emperor...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Emperor? Are you talking about that penguin?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Sure am. Hold on a minute, you know the Baws?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Of course, of course I do. Though it's been a couple of decades since we last met... Eh, was it a few decades? Or a few centuries?  Doesn't matter. I can smell him on you.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: What's that about a few centuries...?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Lordy loo! Who'da thunk I'd meet a friend of the Baws out here!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So you really do exist. I always thought Zumama got messed up in the head and hallucinated you. I was even researching similar cases at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, don't you know, Gavial? Whenever you came to look for Zumama, I was always there watching!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Just like this!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: He disappeared!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hahaha, I wouldn't normally show myself to you, but since I want to pilot the Big Ugly, I have no choice!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Building machines with the little ones is actually a lot of fun!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Speaking of the Big Ugly, shouldn't somebody be driving it?  'cause I'm pretty sure it's about to crash into that house.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, crap! Gotta go!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Wow, he popped back into that thing quick. Badass.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: He'n the Boss really are birds of a feather, huh...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, right, our conversation. Zumama, let's get to the point, if we're gonna fight anyway do we really have to talk about all this stuff?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I have things to say to you, and to myself.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Did you know, Gavial? You were always my biggest obstacle.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Huh? Really?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, not just you, but people like you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: I've tried so many times to teach people about the charm of the machines. But in the end, they're never interested.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Because they look up to strong people, like you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You teach them that, in this place, you get what you want when you're strong.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: It's your strength that stands in the way of progress.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: So I decided to change the way they think. I'm going to use an even greater power to destroy this blind worship of strength that you created.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Well, that makes sense to me. What do you think, Doctor?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Doctor, whose side are you on?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sounds like yer talkin' sense, but it still don't feel right, somehow...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hell yeah! That big clanker's badass!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Honestly, I'm almost convinced myself.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But I never wanted to be anyone's role model. When I say fists solve problems, that's just me talking. It's got nothing to do with anyone else.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I know, I'm not blaming you.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Even so, Gavial, I want to defeat you with the power of the Big Ugly.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Everyone, listen up!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: The Big Ugly will be dueling Gavial once again!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: This battle will decide who is the real Great Chief!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: High Priest, it's time to fight!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Are you ready, Gavial? Your friends can join the fight too!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Finally!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Step back, everybody. This one's mine.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Come at me!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Let's test its performance first!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Fire!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Heh, don't think you'll hit me a second time!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah, those are the reflexes I'd expect from Gavial! No problem. Have a taste of my great iron fist!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: A test of strength, huh? Sounds good to me!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wow, Gavial's strong!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Crazy strong! She stopped its fist all by lonesome!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I know I asked way back when I got my first physical, but why is she a medic again?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...You may be my opponent, but I can't help but cheer for you!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: It's not over yet though! The Big Ugly has a max performance mode for just such an occasion!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Go!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That big guy looks stronger!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And it's suppressing Gavial's strength?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, what a melodious sound...! Hm? Wait, these readings are strange... Whaaa?
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: High Priest, what's going on?!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Waah, my butt's being cooked!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: I'm talking about the Big Ugly!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, I was just sharing my status as well. I think the engine output is too high. I'm losing control of the Big Ugly!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: It's actually quite exhilarating!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Get out of there!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Aren't we fighting? Let's just fight like this! Come, Gavial, I'll finish this once and for all
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: High Priest!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Oh, fine. What a shame. Looks like I'll have to change tactics.
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: Zumama, don't worry about me, I'll do my best to stabilize it. You find a way to stop the Big Ugly in the meantime!
attributes.name: High Priest

attributes.content: ...Gavial, you and your people get out of here. This isn't your business.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Don't you want to beat me?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I do. But not like this.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Come on. Of course I'm going to help. Right, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Fight the monster! I'll help!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.options: Utage, Croissant, prepare for battle!;......;Turns out we do have to help.

attributes.content: Eh, you want me to fight that big guy? Really? What a pain.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I'm gettin' overtime for this one, Baws! Triple rate!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Doctor, don't just sit there and enjoy the show! It's time to take command.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You are kind of a pain sometimes, Doctor.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Go and prepare to take command!
attributes.name: Gavial
